titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on certain high tenacity rayon filament yarn.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 4/17/2002--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2007, the duty on high tenacity multiple (folded) or cabled yarn of viscose rayon.
